DOC.brief_summary: The objective study : - To determine safety tolerability single dose 99mTc-rhAnnexin V-128 administer intravenous bolus 10-20 second . - To determine biodistribution , pharmacokinetics radiation dosimetry 99mTc-rhAnnexin V-128 normal healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: 99mTc-rhAnnexin V-128 : First In Man Study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 65 year 2 . No significant medical history 3 . Normal physical examination 4 . No clinically significant abnormality baseline laboratory value 5 . No clinically significant abnormality 12 lead electrocardiogram 6 . Female subject must postmenopausal , surgically sterilize negative urine beta human chorionic gonadotropin pregnancy test initial screen preinjection dose day 7 . Written inform consent sign 1 . Pregnancy lactation 2 . Know hypersensitivity investigational drug component 3 . Current enrolment another investigational study 4 . Unwillingness provide continue inform consent
